definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: Nap time. Please do not disturb.
There's a Do-Not-Disturb sign on your door knob.
sentences.chinese: 你的房门上挂着“请勿打扰”牌。

sentences.english: Please turn off the DND sign .
Let me press the "Do Not Disturb" button for you.
sentences.chinese: 那我帮您打开“请勿打扰”的按钮。

sentences.english: Do not interrupt while we are rehearsing.
I am sleeping, Please make a DND for me.
sentences.chinese: 我现在要午睡，请您帮我设一个请勿打扰。

sentences.english: Meeting in progress, please do not disturb.
sentences.chinese: 会客中，请勿打扰是什么意思啊？

sentences.english: Ensure guest privacy is respected when DND status is displayed.
sentences.chinese: 确保在“请勿打扰”状态下客人的隐私被维护。

sentences.english: Kindly don't fuss me while I'm concentrating on my work.
sentences.chinese: 当我全神贯注工作时，请勿打扰。

sentences.english: Please Don't Disturb It' or 'Don't Hurt Me.
sentences.chinese: 请勿打扰它”或者“不要伤害我。

sentences.english: If you want short-term friends who do not disturb.
sentences.chinese: 如想短时交友者请勿打扰。

definition: to stand as a goalkeeper/to keep guard on a gate
to go to sleep/to go to bed (literary)
to open a door (lit. and fig.)/to open for business
to leave the door unlocked for sb
locked in (with the door locked from the outside)
